body_html:
I am using Mac OS and it worked. I had done export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH following the CuDNN Install Guide provided by Nvidia. I guess that does not work.

Thank you so much for the help!

I am using Mac OS and it worked. I had done export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH following the CuDNN Install Guide provided by Nvidia. I guess that does not work.

body:
I am using Mac OS and it worked. I had done `export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda/lib$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH` following the CuDNN Install Guide provided by Nvidia. I guess that does not work.

Thank you so much for the help!
